articles.title: 5G scare: AI cancels 8 US flights; DGCA working to overcome situation - Business Standard
articles.description: Air India cancelled eight flights on India-US routes from Wednesday onwards due to deployment of 5G internet in North America  which could interfere with aircraft's navigation systems.

articles.title: 5G rollout disrupts inbound US flights from around the world - Sydney Morning Herald
